data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Riedel, Alexander (2009): Revision of the genus Penthoscapha Heller (Coleoptera, Curculionoidea, Entiminae, Eupholini) with notes on the genera of Eupholini from New Guinea. Zootaxa 2224: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190177
